TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TableNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TableNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 提供屬性，以變更資料表的顯示名稱。

span.span: Provides an attribute to change the displayed name for a table.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name that the table will display.

summary.span: 使用資料表的指定名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體 (Instance)。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name for the table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來從多個內容的實體名稱衝突時，變更中繼資料中的實體名稱。The attribute is used to change the entity name in the metadata when there are entity name conflicts from multiple contexts. 屬性不應該用來變更顯示名稱。The attribute should not be used to change the display name. 請改用屬性來變更顯示名稱。Instead, use the attribute to change the display name. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定資料表名稱。The following example shows how to set the table name. 在範例中，顯示的資料表名稱從"ProductModelProductDescriptions"變更為 「 生產環境模型 Desc"。In the example, the displayed table name is changed from "ProductModelProductDescriptions" to "Prod Model Desc". [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.TableNameAttribute#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.TableNameAttribute/cs/ProductModelProductDescription.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.TableNameAttribute#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.TableNameAttribute/vb/ProductModelProductDescription.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料表的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the table.

value.span: 與資料表相關聯的名稱。

span.span: The name that is associated with a table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將資料表名稱對應至唯一的名稱，在不同的資料內容中的另一個資料表具有相同名稱時使用這個屬性。Use this property to map a table name to a unique name when another table in a different data context has the same name.
